The paper investigates the connection between discrete and continuous perturbations in NLP models to improve robustness. It proposes a method to quantify the correlation between these perturbations using a regression task and a neural network called PerturbScorer. Experiments on IMDB and AG's News datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
